name: SAASPASS Two Factor Authentication – 2FA
author: SAASPASS

sections.description:
Enable the most amazing security and passwordless access to your WordPress. Two-factor authentication (2FA) has never been easier ever. The convenience of a passwordless login with the added security of multi-factor authentication (MFA) at the same time!

If security was always this easy, well then the world would always have been flat!

Here’s to 2 step verification being reimagined once again. Security sometimes should make the world go round and round as well.
sections.installation:
1. Create an account at SAASPASS and get your SAASPASS API key https://www.saaspass.com/sd/#/companyRegistration
  2. Install the plugin either via your site’s dashboard or by downloading the plugin from WordPress.org and uploading the files to your server.
  3. Activate the plugin through the WordPress Plugins menu.
  4. Navigate to Settings -> SAASPASS Two Factor Authentication – 2FA to enter your SAASPASS API key.
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  1. Create an account at SAASPASS and get your SAASPASS API key https://www.saaspass.com/sd/#/companyRegistration
  2. Install the plugin either via your site’s dashboard or by downloading the plugin from WordPress.org and uploading the files to your server.
  3. Activate the plugin through the WordPress Plugins menu.
  4. Navigate to Settings -> SAASPASS Two Factor Authentication – 2FA to enter your SAASPASS API key.

How can a user enable SAASPASS?

A user should download SAASPASS and enable it.

More information on SAASPASS can be found at www.saaspass.com
sections.changelog:
1.0.4

  • Added new authentication options.
    • Administrators are able to protect users by specific roles.
  • UI/UX change.
  • Minor bug fixes

1.0.3

  • Update for SimpleSAMLphp library.
  • Update to work with other wordpress plugins.
  • Enabling custom value for bypassing sso.

1.0.2

  • Updated SimpleSAMLphp library to version 1.14.11.
  • Cleaned up unnecesary files.
  • Changes for plugin submission.

1.0.1

  • Updated SimpleSAMLphp library to version 1.14.7.

1.0.0

  • Initial release
  • This plugin uses a modified SimpleSAMLphp library (version 1.14.4).
  • Some codes are used from saml-20-single-sign-on 0.9.4 plugin.

short_description: SAASPASS provides the easiest way to secure your Wordpress with two-factor authentication (2FA) and enable passwordless security. MFA made amazing!
